Design-01.Description: Design Style 01: is a Solid stripe one color style that does not have any text.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02: is a Solid stripe with a pinstripe accent. The 'accent' (red in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03: is a Solid stripe style with an upper pinstripe accent. The accent (red in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04: is a Solid stripe style with an upper tapered pinstripe stripe style. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be cut out, or an alternate color to the main stripe.

Design-05.Description: Design Style 05: is a Solid stripe style with an extended section that goes further down the nose.

Design-06.Description: Design Style 06: is a Solid stripe style with outer pinstripes stripe style. The outer pinstripes accents (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main twin stripes.

Design-07.Description: Design Style 07: is a Solid stripe style with an upper pinstripe. The upper pinstripe accents (red in image) can be cut out, or alternate color to the main twin stripes.

Design-08.Description: Design Style 08: is a Solid stripe style with an upper tapered pinstripe stripe style. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be cut out, or an alternate color to the main stripe.
